message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation, I'll take a bit more
Your share will be worth even less next round due to inflation. Let's settle this now with a more reasonable split.
I'll meet you halfway from my initial offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation hits you harder
